entry.title: Troubles with Pelican
entry.summary:
If you were wondering why the links on your site didn't work, well boy do I have the guide for you!

Check out the definition of SITEURL in pelicanconf.py. If it equals something other than an empty string, get rid of that stuff!

Then it should start working again â€¦
entry.content:
If you were wondering why the links on your site didn't work, well boy do I have the guide for you!

Check out the definition of SITEURL in pelicanconf.py. If it equals something other than an empty string, get rid of that stuff!

Then it should start working again!

kthxbye
